approach: Add duplicate ID validation in storage.load() to reject JSON files with duplicate todo IDs
summary: Added validation in TodoStorage.load() to detect and reject duplicate IDs in the JSON storage file. This ensures data integrity by preventing silent corruption that could occur when next_id() generates IDs based on max+1 assumption.
risks: External JSON files with duplicate IDs will now fail to load (breaking change for corrupt data)
Small performance overhead for tracking seen IDs during load
mitigation: Clear error message indicates which IDs are duplicated
Performance overhead is minimal (O(n) set operations)
